thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 26 of 288
thread.title: Melanie

author: Melanie
title: Melanie
text:
We have been using Hello Fresh for about a month now. So far I love the variety of meals that are available. Although I love to cook I found I was making the same things over and over again not taking the time to find recipes and if I did I didn't have all the ingredients at hand.
With Hello Fresh I get what I need to make each meal with no waste.
I have no complaints of the quality except for the beef selections.
I am not sure how the shipments will stand up to the South Florida heat in summer.
